summary: A young African American man, reeling from the tragic loss of his wife, travels to rural Maine to seek answers from his estranged mother-in-law, who is herself confronting guilt and grief over her daughter's death.
cast: David Oyelowo|Hani Furstenberg|Neal Lerner|Teyonah Parris|Youness Zakaria|Rosie Perez|Dianne Wiest|Bill Raymond|Bobby Moreno|Graham Hults|Christopher Pittman Smith
title: Five Nights in Maine
